reviewText: My son likes obscure, foreign educational TV shows such as the Numberjacks!  Therefore, my husband ordered this DVD.  However he did so without noticing the playback restrictions!  Once this was discovered, we attempted to return the DVD for a refund, but rather than agree to refund our money, the sellers instead offered a work-around to allow us to play the video on a laptop with a DVD player.  In the end, our son was able to view his show and all was right with the world!

My boy loves it. He first discovered NumberJacks on You Tube and then asked for the DVD, he was pleasantly surprised.

Thanks
